themes.name: default
themes.label: Default
themes.description: Clean default theme with system fonts
themes.author: System

fonts.sans: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif
fonts.serif: Georgia, Cambria, "Times New Roman", Times, serif
fonts.mono: "Fira Code", Monaco, Consolas, "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace
